description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the heap buffer overflow vulnerability identified in CVE-2024-5835 affecting Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based):

1. Update your Microsoft Edge browser to the latest version.
2. Confirm the update by navigating to: **Settings > Help and feedback > About Microsoft Edge**, which will automatically check for updates.

**Details**:
- The latest version to remediate this vulnerability is **126.0.2592.56**, released on **June 13, 2024**. This version ensures that your browser is no longer vulnerable to the heap-based buffer overflow that may lead to exploitation through crafted HTML pages.
- For more details, refer to the Google Chrome release notes linked in the Microsoft guidance. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are connected to the internet to download the update.
- Back up any important browser data before updating in case issues arise during installation.
